Articles.Content:
Hello, I`m getting blank windows when I go IVA.

Here is my log, can anyone see what might be causing it?

http://www./view/u4t18c2uv1y7a0r/KSP.log

I`ve had a look but the only error I can find is from RPM and FAR but they do not seem connected. I also can`t find why there is a 2 minute pause going to the space centre. I must get better at finding errors in my own logs...

Any clues?

EDIT : It seems to be a problem with the ALCOR capsule only. The MK1-2 windows work fine. I`ll reinstall ALCOR and see if that helps

EDIT 2 : No joy. Still blank windows. Everything else works.

EDIT 3 : I`m suspecting some sort of conflict between LoadOnDemand and the ALCOR capsule.

Edited October 19, 2014 by John FX
